column1: Smoque BBQ////Not bad. Probably one of the best in Chicago
column2: actually. It's just that there AREN'T many good BBQ joints in Chicago. They just can't quite find the right mix. Case in point: Smoque. GREAT meat. Quality
column3: in that it's actually smoked everyday
column4: and the aroma of the place brings you to your knees. But their sauce? Not for me. Perhaps I'm spoiled by having lived near Texas for a few years
column5: but there should be a little more natural flavor to the sauce. Oh
column6: and my ribs were cold and the brisket was stringy. I can't fault the pink and grey
column7: though! They know what they're doing with slow smoking the meats.
